body_html:
I had the same problem 'ImportError: dlopen(/Users/dwdcw/miniconda3/envs/tf27/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/_pywrap_tensorflow_internal.so, ' .
I solved this by using VirtualEnv to install tensorflow and then success.
I think maybe VirtualEnv can provide more clear enviroment. You can try
